sentence.Network_en: The old boat was moving along creakily.
sentence.Network_cn: 那条破旧的船吱吱嘎嘎地向前移动着.

sentences.sentence: "the old boat was moving along creakily"

auth_sentence.content: The sound of its eerie wailing is both creakily old fashioned and thoroughly modern.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sound of its eerie wailing is both creakily old fashioned and thoroughly modern.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sound of its eerie wailing is both creakily old fashioned and thoroughly modern.

auth_sentence.content: He climbed out of the car creakily, as if out of a space capsule after an interplanetary voyage.
auth_sentence.res_content: He climbed out of the car creakily, as if out of a space capsule after an interplanetary voyage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He climbed out of the car creakily, as if out of a space capsule after an interplanetary voyage.
